Text: Editing seems to be disabled atm but the resolution is 704x528 and nothing else.

Thanks for the upload trentkort. 

There are only series 1, 7, 9 and 10 available. Could you upload the others, please?

Cheers, Starbeer!

Thank you so much, these are the best rips available of the early Poirot episodes! I'd be extremely grateful if you or someone else could upload the missing early series in similar quality.  Also, would it be possible to rip the English subtitles from the DVDs? There are no proper English subtitles available online for the early series, just some autotranslated from Portuguese or something. Many thanks!
The quality is shit to be honest. Even the old avi rips were better than this. It's very pixelated and grainy.
